product_name: Voile Splitboard Hardware for Splitboard Bindings
long_description: Have a factory-built splitboard with inserts but need the Voile hardware? The Voile Universal splitboard hardware kit for Light Rail bindings lets you turn your split into a backcountry powerhouse.
short_description: Have a factory-built splitboard with inserts but need the Voile hardware? The Voile Universal splitboard hardware kit for Light Rail bindings lets you turn your split into a backcountry powerhouse.
